data.text: Mostly finished!
data.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
data.processed: 󠁿Mostly finished!

data.text:
Wa Ha Ha! Holding back is unnecessary! Our Tracen 
Academy is a place where the dreams of Uma Musume 
are realized! Therefore… it's only natural!
data.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
data.processed:
󠁿Wa Ha Ha! Holding back is unnecessary! Our Tracen 
󠁿Academy is a place where the dreams of Uma Musume 
󠁿are realized! Therefore… it's only natural!

data.text:
Absolutely befitting! We also requested of you to help us! 
That devotion to duty… truly admirable!
data.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
data.processed:
󠁿Absolutely befitting! We also requested of you to help us! 
󠁿That devotion to duty… truly admirable!

data.text:
However, now is the pivotal moment. 
Fine Motion, are you prepared?
data.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
data.processed:
󠁿However, now is the pivotal moment. 
󠁿Fine Motion, are you prepared?

data.text:
The final move, from you. …With your own words, convey your 
feelings to your esteemed father!
data.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
data.processed:
󠁿The final move, from you. …With your own words, convey your 
󠁿feelings to your esteemed father!

data.text: Yes!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Yes!

data.text:
Their preparations are complete. 
Then… commencing communication.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
󠁿Their preparations are complete. 
󠁿Then… commencing communication.

data.text:
The SP Commander respectfully held the smartphone before her. 
On the other end, the one waiting for Fine Motion's words was-
data.processed:
󠁿The SP Commander respectfully held the smartphone before her. 
󠁿On the other end, the one waiting for Fine Motion's words was-

data.text: -It has been far too long, Father.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿-It has been far too long, Father.

data.text:
"Fine…I've heard the circumstances. In light of that, I shall 
ask once more. While you've been away from your country, have you 
forgotten your duties?"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"Fine…I've heard the circumstances. In light of that, I shall 
󠁿ask once more. While you've been away from your country, have you 
󠁿forgotten your duties?"

data.text:
No. Even now, my duty and pride remain in my heart. 
Therefore, I am fully aware of the selfishness in my request.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿No. Even now, my duty and pride remain in my heart. 
󠁿Therefore, I am fully aware of the selfishness in my request.

data.text:
Even so, I… I myself will follow my heart. 
Here, right now, I wish to run!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Even so, I… I myself will follow my heart. 
󠁿Here, right now, I wish to run!

data.text:
"…Even if you doze off in this momentary dream, you absolutely 
cannot escape from the duty you were born with. The feeling of 
drowning in your losses, will tear your heart asunder."
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"…Even if you doze off in this momentary dream, you absolutely 
󠁿cannot escape from the duty you were born with. The feeling of 
󠁿drowning in your losses, will tear your heart asunder."

data.text:
"Fine… my wise, sensible daughter. The thorny path you've 
chosen will inevitably lead you through suffering and bitterness. 
Knowing this, do you still wish to proceed?"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"Fine… my wise, sensible daughter. The thorny path you've 
󠁿chosen will inevitably lead you through suffering and bitterness. 
󠁿Knowing this, do you still wish to proceed?"

data.text: Yes. I do!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Yes. I do!

data.text:
-Father, you know, I've come to understand. The 
feeling of running with all your might, to compete, 
to run through faster than anyone else!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿-Father, you know, I've come to understand. The 
󠁿feeling of running with all your might, to compete, 
󠁿to run through faster than anyone else!

data.text:
I can't forget…I don't want to forget. I want to run! 
I want to test how far I can run with these legs!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿I can't forget…I don't want to forget. I want to run! 
󠁿I want to test how far I can run with these legs!

data.text: "…I see."
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed: 󠁿"…I see."

data.text:
"If you're willing to go that far, first you must prove yourself 
before me. Your resolve, your desire… your potential!"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"If you're willing to go that far, first you must prove yourself 
󠁿before me. Your resolve, your desire… your potential!"

data.text:
And so, Fine Motion would be participating 
in the upcoming Selection Race.
data.processed:
󠁿And so, Fine Motion would be participating 
󠁿in the upcoming Selection Race.

data.text:
1, 2, 1,2… there. To fully convince my father, 
we definitely need results, don't we?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿1, 2, 1,2… there. To fully convince my father, 
󠁿we definitely need results, don't we?

data.text:
We definitely need to prove it with results… a run befitting of 
the family's reputation and the pride it bears.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿We definitely need to prove it with results… a run befitting of 
󠁿the family's reputation and the pride it bears.

data.text: Nope. Not at all! Rather, I'm excited!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Nope. Not at all! Rather, I'm excited!

data.text: After all…I get to run!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿After all…I get to run!!

data.text:
All right, Trainer! Can I trouble you to train me to the best of 
your abilities until the Selection race?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿All right, Trainer! Can I trouble you to train me to the best of 
󠁿your abilities until the Selection race?

data.text:
And so, in preparation for the race, Fine Motion 
earnestly spent day after day training.
data.processed:
󠁿And so, in preparation for the race, Fine Motion 
󠁿earnestly spent day after day training.

data.text: And then-
data.processed: 󠁿And then-

data.text: Suuu…Huu!
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Go have fun out there, Fine

data.processed: 󠁿Suuu…Huu!

data.text: -Yeah! I'll be off!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿-Yeah! I'll be off!

data.text:
Trainer-sama, I have finished setting it up. 
Please head over to that computer terminal.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-sama, I have finished setting it up. 
󠁿Please head over to that computer terminal.

data.text:
With her Father watching over her from behind the screen, 
finally, Fine Motion's race was about to begin!
data.processed:
󠁿With her Father watching over her from behind the screen, 
󠁿finally, Fine Motion's race was about to begin!

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOA…!)
data.processed: 󠁿(WHOOOOOOOOOOA…!)

data.text: "…so you're the trainer, that discovered Fine's true feelings?"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed: 󠁿"…so you're the trainer, that discovered Fine's true feelings?"

data.text:
"Ever since long ago, she's always been very clever. 
She thoroughly understood the duties and conduct of royalty- 
and she held back the feelings in her heart"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"Ever since long ago, she's always been very clever. 
󠁿She thoroughly understood the duties and conduct of royalty- 
󠁿and she held back the feelings in her heart"

data.text: "That was how it was. But now-"
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed: 󠁿"That was how it was. But now-"

data.text: Haa, haa, haa…!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Haa, haa, haa…!!

data.text:
Not yet… not yet, more!! 
I can still go faster!! HAAAAAAAAA!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Not yet… not yet, more!! 
󠁿I can still go faster!! HAAAAAAAAA!!

data.text:
(Aah, that's right. It's been so long I've forgotten. 
My daughter, can make that kind of face-)
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿(Aah, that's right. It's been so long I've forgotten. 
󠁿My daughter, can make that kind of face-)

data.text: Reaaaady… GO!…Ahahahaha!
data.name: Young Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Reaaaady… GO!…Ahahahaha!

data.text:
The Selection race's first place goes to, Fine Motion!! 
It's Fine Motion!! With her wonderful run she grasps victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿The Selection race's first place goes to, Fine Motion!! 
󠁿It's Fine Motion!! With her wonderful run she grasps victory!

data.text:
"…that's right, it's been a long time. Maybe I should be a 
little more selfish, too. Not as a Lord… but as your father."
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿"…that's right, it's been a long time. Maybe I should be a 
󠁿little more selfish, too. Not as a Lord… but as your father."

data.text:
(Good grief, to think she'd desire the world of 
racing just like her older sister… is this what 
they mean by 'It's in your blood'?)
data.name: Fine's Father
data.processed:
󠁿(Good grief, to think she'd desire the world of 
󠁿racing just like her older sister… is this what 
󠁿they mean by 'It's in your blood'?)

data.text: …it can't be true.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿…it can't be true.

data.text:
It can't be true, it can't be true! 
To think father would give her permission!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿It can't be true, it can't be true! 
󠁿To think father would give her permission!

data.text:
Yeah…! If that's the case, 
there's no choice but to "Party Hard" tonight, right?!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah…! If that's the case, 
󠁿there's no choice but to "Party Hard" tonight, right?!

data.text: Ahem. Well then, this time too-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Ahem. Well then, this time too-

data.text: Will you escort me? Trainer!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: 󠁿Will you escort me? Trainer!

data.text:
And thus, I became in charge of Fine Motion. And for now- 
We headed to that Ramen shop where she got that coupon.
data.processed:
󠁿And thus, I became in charge of Fine Motion. And for now- 
󠁿We headed to that Ramen shop where she got that coupon.
